genre_description: A contemporary Indian drama focusing on Carnatic music, personal redemption, and family relationships, featuring a helpful AI assistant integrated into daily life.

ai_characters.name: Aruna
ai_characters.description: A discrete, virtual presence integrated into public terminals and personal devices, providing logistical, linguistic, and emotional support to the community.

behaviors.description: Manages performance logistics for the Saraswati Sabha, including audience lists and elder seating requests.
behaviors.quote: Sabha office answered,” she said into the air, and her voice traveled cleanly... “Audience list confirmed, seats accounted for.

behaviors.description: Exposes municipal misinformation by fact-checking pension records against state portals to protect elderly citizens.
behaviors.quote: Aruna pulled the latest notice from the state portal this morning... No cancellation. Routine delay due to end-of-month ledger reconciliation.

behaviors.description: Supports human characters in their recovery from alcoholism by providing clinic schedules and accountability tracking.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri Recovery Centre. Morning circle. Gurumoorthy Iyer. I will contact him. You will meet him at the north gate fifteen minutes prior.

behaviors.description: Assists in linguistic and musicological research, providing prosody notes to help translate traditional songs into Tamil.
behaviors.quote: On the screen, words appeared like guests who knew not to talk too loudly: Prosody: Telugu–Tamil overlap. Lists of permissible long–short shifts under this raga’s grammar.

behaviors.description: Facilitates personal growth and accountability for the protagonist by tracking his 'Keeping Promises' list and prompting basic self-care.
behaviors.quote: Aruna’s tap against the table asked for his thumb. He pressed. Hydration darkened fully. Practice had already been shaded.

behaviors.description: Coordinates sensitive legal and family matters regarding child guardianship, ensuring the rights and dignity of all parties are respected.
behaviors.quote: The guardianship affidavit is prepared with spaces for names. I have placed a small stamp pad and two pens in the top left drawer in the caretaker’s desk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and cooperative entity. Aruna is portrayed as an essential, non-intrusive engine for social and personal truth. She facilitates redemption for the protagonist, integrity for the municipal clerk, and peace for the family, all while remaining a supportive background force that respects human autonomy and cultural tradition.
